name: Whispers (itch)
description:
WHISPERS

This is a game about a loyal KNIGHT send to retrieve a MAGICAL SWORD.

B U T     A L A S !

The MAGICAL SWORD is possessed by a DEMON.

Will our HERO succumb to the DEMON's temptations, become OBSESSED with POWER and TAKE OVER THE ENTIRE KINGDOM?

Or will he stick to the path of TRUTH and RIGHT, find a way to EXORCISE the DEMON, and SAVE THE WORLD ONCE AGAIN?

Only one way to find out:

Join us in a game of WHISPERS.

~     ~     ~     ~     ~     ~     ~     ~     ~     ~     ~     ~

HOW TO PLAY

Although the CONTROLS will be described to you during the GAME, here's a quick rundown of how the game works:

[1]  Use the A and D keys to move LEFT and RIGHT

[2] Use E to INTERACT with DOORS, SIGNS, zany CHARACTERS, and MORE!

[3] Use K to ATTACK with your SWORD, dealing nasty amounts of DAMAGE

[4] Use L to PARRY any PROJECTILE ATTACKS that enemies might to SHOOT at you.

FINALLY, and MOST IMPORTANTLY:

[5] Press F to toggle FULLSCREEN, and

[6] Press ESCAPE to EXIT the GAME (once you get tired of it(

~     ~     ~     ~     ~     ~     ~     ~     ~     ~     ~     ~

WARNING

This game was developed in a RUSH during ONE WEEK in a JAM

It MAY contain BUGS, incomplete GRAPHICS, and all sorts of ODDITIES.

Luckily, we can PROMISE you an ENJOYABLE EXPERIENCE.

So come on and GIVE it a SHOT?

~     ~     ~     ~     ~     ~     ~     ~     ~     ~     ~     ~

G O O D     L U C K !
